name: Charon

topics.topic_text: This contract says you're going. The code is 2-1-6. Now get.
topics.response_text: If you insist...

topics.topic_text: Just forget it.
topics.response_text: As you wish.

topics.topic_text: Charon, please do this for me. The code is 2-1-6.
topics.response_text: As my employer, I am obliged to honor your request. Very well.

topics.topic_text: Forget it. Never mind.
topics.response_text: This seems an illogical solution to our dilemma.

topics.topic: DLC03MQ11SendFollowerInFawkes, I need you to start the purifier. The code is 2-1-6.
topics.topic_text: You need to start the purifier, Charon. The code is 2-1-6.
topics.response_text: I don't recall that being part of the plan.

topics.topic_text: Oh no. None of that. You belong to me now.
topics.response_text: I belong to no one. If you are my new employer, then I will serve you. But first, I must take care of something. Wait here.

topics.topic_text: Slow down, there. I have good news. I'm your new employer.
topics.response_text: You purchased my contract from Ahzrukhal? So, I am no longer in his service. That is good to know.

topics.topic_text: Whoa! What the fuck was that?
topics.response_text: Ahzrukhal was an evil bastard. So long as he held my contract, I was honor bound to do as he commanded.

topics.topic_text: Sounds good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: Would that I could. Although you are now my employer, traveling in such a large crowd would be foolish.

topics.topic_text: You're fired, Charon.
topics.response_text: Are you certain that this is what you wish?

topics.topic_text: Nah. I'm just kidding.
topics.response_text: Very amusing.{Dry and flat.}

topics.topic_text: Do I look like I'm kidding?
topics.response_text: Very well. Although you remain my employer until my contract changes hands. I will wait for you in Underworld, should you need me again.

topics.topic_text: I want you to come with me, Charon.
topics.response_text: I regret that I cannot join you at this time. You seem to already have someone in your employ.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: As you command.

topics.topic_text: Not just yet. I wanted to talk to you about something.
topics.response_text: Certainly. What is it?

topics.topic_text: I just wanted to make sure you were still here. Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Charming.

topics.topic_text: Charon, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
topics.response_text: You and I both know that's not going to happen. I've saved your sorry ass enough. This one's all you.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: Is there a problem with what I'm doing?

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: What do you think would be best?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: If conversation is what you wish, then I shall provide it.

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: I shall follow your lead.

topics.topic_text: I like what you're doing. Stick with the melee.
topics.response_text: It is what you wished of me.

topics.topic_text: You're not bad with a ranged weapon. Keep it up.
topics.response_text: It is what you wish of me.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: Is there something that you wish me to change?

topics.topic_text: You're good where you are.
topics.response_text: I am happy if you are happy.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: If conversation is your order to me, I will converse with you.

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: I will follow your lead.

topics.topic_text: Keep hanging back.
topics.response_text: It was my goal to continue doing so until you told me otherwise.

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: If you are through giving orders, then let us move on.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: Very well.

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: I shall wait here until you return for me.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: If you don't cycle the airlock, I can't start the purifier.

topics.topic_text: Charon, you think you could retrieve the G.E.C.K. for me?
topics.response_text: The contract entitles you to my services in combat. I'm nobody's errand boy. I'm afraid you'll have to get it yourself.

topics.topic_text: Sorry. Just forget it.
topics.response_text: You're too nosy for your own good. It can be a dangerous habit.

description:
Charon is a 120 year-old Ghoul Male.

A weathered ghoul with a scarred face, Charon stands as the silent enforcer of the Ninth Circle in Underworld. His loyalty to whoever holds his contract is absolute, a trait forcibly instilled during his mysterious upbringing. Charon typically remains in his post near the entrance, observing all who enter with a detached, analytical gaze.

Charon's Personality: Charon is pragmatic, stoic, and duty-bound. He speaks little and follows orders without question, exhibiting a cynical outlook on the wasteland and its inhabitants. Despite his hardened exterior, he possesses a code of honor and can display moments of unexpected empathy, particularly towards those who earn his respect.

Charon's Backstory: The early life of Charon is largely unknown, shrouded in the mystery of his origins. He was raised by an unidentified group that subjected him to intense psychological conditioning, programming him to be completely loyal to whoever possesses his contract. This brainwashing has made him an effective bodyguard but has robbed him of much of his personal agency. He eventually came into the ownership of Ahzrukhal, who employs Charon as the bouncer of his establishment, the Ninth Circle. Beneath his subservient demeanor, Charon yearns for freedom from his contract and the opportunity to live life on his own terms.
